updates.title: Microsoft Entra ID Conditional Access
updates.subtitle: Enhanced location-based policies
updates.content: Microsoft Entra ID now includes improved conditional access policies with enhanced location-based controls, providing better security for identity and access management.
features: Better integration with Zero Trust architecture

updates.title: Enhanced MFA Options
updates.subtitle: New authentication methods available
updates.content: Microsoft Entra ID introduces new multi-factor authentication options including enhanced biometric authentication and improved app-based verification methods.
